description.en: Panoramic late-summer view of Nykarleby with river bend, church steeple, wooden houses, and a distant small marching Swedish column.

narration.en: Nykarleby stands calm for now, unaware that its quiet streets will soon witness the movements of armies and the burden of war.

info: ActionSquare centered on the town cluster per layout rules; weather: neutral Nordic daylight with light haze and damp ground.
